org.peertrust.protege.plugin
Class PolicyFrameworkModel

java.lang.Object
  org.peertrust.protege.plugin.PolicyFrameworkModel
public class PolicyFrameworkModel
extends java.lang.Object

PolicyFrameworkModel provides a framework which ease the integration of security attributes with your ontology.

getLocalPolicy

public java.util.Collection getLocalPolicy(edu.stanford.smi.protege.model.Cls cls,
                                           java.lang.String specialSlotName,
                                           boolean isLocalyDefinedValue)
To get the policies that are definied in a specific class. The flague iSLocallyDefinedValue indicates whether the policies are local to a specific class or inheritated. Since that class ist not neccesarely equals to the cls provides as argument, its value have to be rovided externaly through a parameter.

Parameters:
cls -
specialSlotName -
isLocalyDefinedValue -
Returns:
